none.$description: 0px - No padding. Use when content should touch container edges.

xs.$description: 4px - Extra small padding (all sides). For compact chips, dense badges, tight icon containers.

sm.$description: 8px - Small padding (all sides). For compact cards, small tooltips, dense list items.

md.$description: 16px - Medium padding (all sides) - DEFAULT. For standard cards, dialogs, content containers.

lg.$description: 24px - Large padding (all sides). For prominent cards, hero content, spacious containers.

xl.$description: 32px - Extra large padding (all sides). For page sections, modal dialogs, feature containers.

xs.$description: 4px - Extra small horizontal padding (left + right). For micro spacing in icons.

sm.$description: 8px - Small horizontal padding (left + right). For compact chips, small tags.

md.$description: 16px - Medium horizontal padding (left + right) - DEFAULT. For standard components.

lg.$description: 24px - Large horizontal padding (left + right). For buttons, nav items, spacious elements.

xl.$description: 32px - Extra large horizontal padding (left + right). For hero buttons, prominent CTAs.

xs.$description: 4px - Extra small vertical padding (top + bottom). For compact inline elements.

sm.$description: 8px - Small vertical padding (top + bottom). For buttons, compact inputs.

md.$description: 12px - Medium vertical padding (top + bottom) - DEFAULT for buttons. For standard button height.

lg.$description: 16px - Large vertical padding (top + bottom). For text fields, comfortable inputs.

xl.$description: 24px - Extra large vertical padding (top + bottom). For large form fields, spacious inputs.

xs.$description: 4px - Extra small margin (all sides). For micro separation between tightly related elements.

sm.$description: 8px - Small margin (all sides). For compact spacing between related components.

md.$description: 16px - Medium margin (all sides) - DEFAULT. For standard component separation.

lg.$description: 24px - Large margin (all sides). For prominent component separation.

xl.$description: 32px - Extra large margin (all sides). For major section separation.

xs.$description: 4px - Extra small horizontal margin (left + right). For tight inline spacing.

sm.$description: 8px - Small horizontal margin (left + right). For button groups, inline elements.

md.$description: 16px - Medium horizontal margin (left + right) - DEFAULT. For standard horizontal spacing.

lg.$description: 24px - Large horizontal margin (left + right). For prominent horizontal separation.

xl.$description: 32px - Extra large horizontal margin (left + right). For grid gutters, column spacing.

xs.$description: 4px - Extra small vertical margin (top + bottom). For tight stacking, label-to-input.

sm.$description: 8px - Small vertical margin (top + bottom). For list items, form field groups.

md.$description: 16px - Medium vertical margin (top + bottom) - DEFAULT. For paragraph spacing, content sections.

lg.$description: 24px - Large vertical margin (top + bottom). For major content sections, card groups.

xl.$description: 32px - Extra large vertical margin (top + bottom). For page section dividers.

xxl.$description: 48px - Maximum vertical margin (top + bottom). For hero-to-content spacing, major divisions.

none.$description: 0px - No gap. For elements that should touch in flex/grid layouts.

xs.$description: 4px - Extra small gap. For dense grids, compact chip groups, tight layouts.

sm.$description: 8px - Small gap. For standard chip groups, icon grids, compact lists.

md.$description: 16px - Medium gap - DEFAULT. For card grids, form layouts, standard component spacing.

lg.$description: 24px - Large gap. For spacious grids, prominent card layouts.

xl.$description: 32px - Extra large gap. For hero layouts, feature grids, prominent sections.

xs.$description: 4px - Extra small column gap. For dense horizontal layouts.

sm.$description: 8px - Small column gap. For compact horizontal grids, button groups.

md.$description: 16px - Medium column gap - DEFAULT. For standard horizontal grid spacing.

lg.$description: 24px - Large column gap. For spacious horizontal layouts, grid gutters.

xl.$description: 32px - Extra large column gap. For wide column spacing, prominent grid gutters.

xs.$description: 4px - Extra small row gap. For dense vertical layouts, compact lists.

sm.$description: 8px - Small row gap. For standard list spacing, form field groups.

md.$description: 16px - Medium row gap - DEFAULT. For standard vertical grid spacing, card lists.

lg.$description: 24px - Large row gap. For spacious vertical layouts, section spacing.

xl.$description: 32px - Extra large row gap. For major vertical separation in grids.

0.$description: 0px - Aucun espacement. Use for elements that should touch or overlap.

1.$description: 4px - Micro spacing. For tight internal component spacing, icon-to-text, dense lists.

2.$description: 8px - Extra small. For compact component padding, small gaps between related elements.

3.$description: 12px - Small. For standard gaps between closely related elements, small card padding.

4.$description: 16px - Medium (M3 DEFAULT). For standard component padding, form field gaps, list item spacing.

5.$description: 20px - Medium-large. For comfortable breathing room between form sections.

6.$description: 24px - Large. For section margins, card padding, dialog content spacing.

7.$description: 28px - Large variant. For generous component margins.

8.$description: 32px - Extra large. For major section divisions, prominent content areas, modal padding.

10.$description: 40px - XXL. For significant visual breaks between major content blocks.

12.$description: 48px - XXXL. For page-level margins, hero section padding, major layout divisions.

16.$description: 64px - Maximum standard. For dramatic visual separation, landing page sections.

20.$description: 80px - Extended. For wide screens and maximum visual breathing room.

24.$description: 96px - Maximum. For largest possible gaps in desktop layouts.

touch-target-min.$description: 48px - Minimum touch target (M3 accessibility requirement). All interactive elements must meet this minimum.

xs.$description: 16px - Extra small icon. For inline text icons, compact UI.

sm.$description: 20px - Small icon. For dense layouts, secondary icons.

md.$description: 24px - Medium icon (M3 DEFAULT). Standard icon size for most contexts.

lg.$description: 32px - Large icon. For prominent actions, navigation.

xl.$description: 40px - Extra large icon. For hero elements, empty states.

xxl.$description: 48px - Maximum icon. For illustrations, feature highlights.
